content: elegant flowers a comfortable size and rainbow colours make the noëlle blanket a must-have crochet pattern this stunning project is designed to work with a scheepjes catona colour pack which helps you to create this fluid rainbow-gradient blanket the pattern is suitable for intermediate crocheters the written instructions step you through the pattern while clear diagrams and photo tutorials demonstrate how to put the flower motifs together **scheepjes catona 100% mercerized cotton 100g/250m ** * colour a 106 snow white x 8 balls * catona colour pack 109 x 10g balls of all colours x 1
